content: this no-sew pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and video tutorial to help you along the way pocket santa is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round pocket santa is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 3 5 inches tall not including hat be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed to make pocket santa -super bulky 6 weight yarn i used premier parfait chunky chenille yarn -h 5mm crochet hook -two 14mm plastic safety eyes not recommended for children under 3 years old -polyfil or stuffing of your choice -yarn needle -scissors -locking stitch markers optional do not distribute alter sell or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
